The relief washes over you in such an awesome wave, that you can't help but to laugh out loud as she exclaims "That's it isn't it? Come on you have too tell me about him."

You sigh, "There is no man."

She looks at you for a minute then her mouth gapes open "Of course, a woman as cute and successful as you would only be single by choice." She leans in real close and whispers "Are you a lesbian?" This question is even more absurd then the last one and causes you to laugh even more as you respond "THAT's... None of your business."

She keeps eyeing you over like a hungry dog. "Then what is it then? Cause I know you weren't sick for that long."

choices: You tell her to meet you at your office after her shift ends..
1221.content:
You look at her for a minute as you contemplate very carefully on the next word that comes from your lips. On one hand, she is your best friend and you've trusted her with secrets before, but on the other hand you know those office girls do nothing but gossip about everyone all day long, so even though she has never betrayed your trust yet you know the opportunity is there.

All of a sudden, another thought jumps into you head though. You look her over from head to toe and realize she is probably the healthiest person you know. Despite her atrocious diet of Mocha Lattes and anything that may pass for a pastry during the work hours, and her ability to drink most frat boys under the table at the local clubs on the weekends. she has always been very physically active her entire life and manages to stay in very good shape.
You don't like to admit it, but being someone you trust, and being in exceptionally good health she would make the perfect Guinea Pig.

Amanda starts to tap her foot “Well?” its time to make a decision.
1221.title: Take her aside and tell her the truth..

choices: The day runs on as usual until Amanda shows up..
12213.content:
You start to feel anxious as you begin to speak. part of you wants to tell her everything, but the other side of you wants to tread on the side of caution. You hands start to tremble and your toes fidget a bit as sweat beads above your brow line. You cant even believe you're thinking about doing this to your best friend, but as you thought before. She would be the ideal guinea pig as you know you can trust her not to talk and from a basic physical health standpoint shes probably even in better shape than you are.

“Ummm Kat, you're acting weird. Are you going to ask me out on a date or something?” she says half joking trying to break the awkward silence.

“I need you to come to my office once your shift ends.” you blurt out.

She looks at you, confused for a moment, then suddenly her eyes light up. “OH! I get it.” she leans in close and whispers. “I get it, it must be something pretty juicy if you can't even talk about it in the open.... Don't worry, your secrets safe with me.”

The first bell rings alerting you both that you really need to get to your post, so she turns to start walking away. “I look forward to hearing all the juicy details tonight.” she muses to aloud to both you and herself as she walks away from you.

“God damn, that was tense.” you think internally as you make your way to your class.


You get to your class room. its a very typical layout like one would see on TV. THe class is shaped like a half circle with stairs leading down to your desk and chalkboard on the lowest point as though they were the stage you are performing upon at a concert hall or something....

choices: Amanda shows up, But someone is with her.
122132.content:
The day goes on pretty routine and average. You give your lectures and try your best to prepare your students for life after school. All the while you cant help but glance over at your suit jacket draped over the back of your desk chair thinking about whats just laying there in its pocket.

Just know that if you were so inclined you could reduce everyone in this room to the size of bugs or even smaller than a dust particle makes you feel excited. As a strong, well educated, and independent woman you've always felt empowered, and in control, but THIS, This is something all together different. With this device you can do pretty-much whatever you want to whomever you want, and that makes you feel more powerful than you've ever felt before.

On the flip-side however, you cant help but feel the sting in the back of your mind knowing all too well what you have planned for your best friend. “She'll be fine. I'll take good care of her, and once I've collected all the data I need I'll return her to normal safe and sound.” you think internally trying to reason away your guilt.


Time seems to drag on, but 3:00 finally rolls around. The classroom empties out and you wait.

info.brief_description: You're Dr. Anderson & you have invented a weapon the likes of which the worlds never seen
info.description:
This story was originally a section of "The growing/Shrinking Terror", but I wanted to prune that story to direct ist shape a little better, though I couldn't bring myself too delete this part...

I read threw it, and thought "This could probably make a good stand alone title, and its a great way to explain where the shrinking device I use in all my other stories comes from..


Anyway, you play the role of Dr. Katherine M. Anderson, you are a 34 year old, single, white, British Woman. Despite having been born and raised in london you ended up looking mostly like your mother whom your father met while on working in Mexico. You have tan skin, long brown hair, and big dark brown eyes, and you stand at about 5.9

You work at an American college as a professor in Mechanical Engineering. despite using your Doctorate in Mechanical Engineering to teach, you were somewhat of a child prodigy growing up, so you were able to finish high school early and over a long path as a student you now hold varying levels of education in Human Biology, Microbiology, and Medicine from this same university. the only real reason you even have a job here is because the you were offered a job here about 7 years ago and your parents encouraged you to take it.

:THE RULES:
As you can imagine, a device that can control the size of living/nonliving mater leaves for many interesting probabilities, so here's my simple rules...
Rules updated on 1/24/2015
after a few years I've decided that there are a few alterations that need to be made to the rules.

1. Clothing doesn't grow or shrink with the target because Living mater and nonliving mater are two separate settings on the device so its impossible to alter the size of both the subject and his/her clothing in one shot...

2. Death is ok... But when/if Miss Anderson dies its the end of that story "NO CHANGE OVERS!!"

3. No transformation stuff. If you want to turn people into rats, snakes, and spiders, then you'll have to look elsewhere.
This rule also applies to changing a person's age and/or a person's gender.
Sorry, but this is strictly a Size Story.

4. Please add good/well written chapters. I'm not trying to be a dick or pick on anyone here, but I'm tired of having to sift through shit in my own stories, so I'm going through and Editing or Deleting the bad chapters
Don't think I'm unfair, I don't mind minor spelling and grammar errors, but If you couldn't be bothered with READING the last couple chapters enough to keep from changing a characters name or screwing up the continuity of the story, then I WILL delete your fucking chapter.
the same goes for broken English. I get that there's a lot of people here that aren't from an English speaking country, and I'm more than happy to have you read and add to my stories, BUT if your chapters are barely readable I will delete them.

5. Anything else really goes though, I'm not picky.
Gay, straight, toilet stuff, hard vore, feet crush, and anything else that gets you going is all good.

6. Lastly and Most importantly. HAVE FUN. Don't be at all shy about posting......
